ygData.subject: Re: Divine aura or divine barrier
ygData.msgSnippet: There are occasions where I will keep both mem d but I ALWAYS have DA mem d.  DB is good for when a mob is beating on you and your tank is having problems
ygData.messageBody:
There are occasions where I will keep both mem'd but I ALWAYS have DA mem'd. DB is good for when a mob is beating on you and your tank is having problems pulling them off. Then you blow off a DB (inverse taunt), sit down and med back your 100 mana.

DA - Primary
DB - Secondary

~ren
----- Original Message -----
From: Woland Grauensturm
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 7:22 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Divine aura or divine barrier



I just reached level 29 and tested divine barrier. I am a bit disappointed.
I noticed that divine barrier lasts for around 22 secs while divine aura
lasts for some 20 secs. Divine barrier also restores some HPs, I was
standing and noticed around 50 hit points regenerated.

But 100 mana!?! That is a lot of mana in an emergency. Can the rest of you
clerics please give me advice. What do you prefer to use after level 29?

// JS
